dmca.title: Cease and Desist - Copyright Infringement
dmca.body:
nc

-----Original Message-----
From: A Passion for Jazz! [mailto:mail@apassion4jazz.net] 
Sent: Tuesday, February 08, 2005 1:34 PM
To: support@theplanet.com
Cc: mxtabs@mxtabs.net; copyright@theplanet.com
Subject: Cease and Desist - Copyright Infringement




Subject: Cease and Desist - Copyright Infringement


Dears Sir/Madam,

You or your client are in violation of international copyright law.

Unauthorized duplication  or remote linking to copyrighted material is
unlawful. You do not have
permission to publish, serve, or otherwise duplicate our property on your
website.

Unauthorized content is found on:

http://www.musicianforums.com/forums/article.php?a=497
http://www.musicianforums.com/forums/article.php?a=7


It is unlawful to infringe our copyright by remote linking to:
http://www.apassion4jazz.net/images3/degrees.gif
and
http://www.apassion4jazz.net/images3/grand_staff.gif
and
http://www.apassion4jazz.net/images3/chords.gif


Our copyright notice "All Rights Reserved" is posted every page and links to
the long version: http://www.apassion4jazz.net/copy.html

Cease and desist by removing  content belonging to www.apassion4jazz.net
from your website immediately, or formal complaints will be filed.

Signature:/D C DowDell/ Date: 2005/02/08
Signatory's Name: D C DowDell
Signatory's Position: owner


A Passion for Jazz!
5155 W Point Loma Blvd, suite #13
San Diego, CA, USA
619.223.2069
619.855.2069
www.apassion4jazz.net

cc: Goldberg and Fink, esq.
